All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
 
Bezier
 
Camera
 
CheckerPigment
Class for checker pigments that implements the Pigment interface.
ColorUtil
Manages the mixing of colours of light Rays as well as how their brightness changes as those Rays bounce around the Scene.
Cone
 
Cylinder
Fully describes a Cylinder's placement, orientation and size in a Scene as well as whether a Ray has intersected the Cylinder or not.
Disc
Fully describes a Disc's placement and orientation in a Scene as well as whether a Ray has intersected the Disc or not.
Finish
 
GradientPigment
 
GUI
 
Light
 
Log
Logs the state of the application including whether the current state has encountered an error or warning.
Main
 
Matrix
 
Parallelogram
 
Pigment
An interface for pigments that is to be implemented in other classes.
Plane
Fully describes a Plane's placement and orientation in a Scene as well as whether a Ray has intersected the Plane or not.
Point
 
Polygon
 
Polyhedron
 
Ray
Fully describes the state of a Ray of light active in the Scene.
RayHit
RayHit is a class which computes and then stores all the information produced when a Ray is incident upon a Shape RayHit(Ray, Shape, Vector, double, boolean).
RayTracer
 
Scene
The Scene class fully describes the state of the Scene's Camera, AmbientLight, Lights and Shapes.
Shape
 
SolidPigment
Class for solid pigments that implements the Pigment interface
Sphere
Fully describes a Sphere's placement and size in a Scene as well as whether a Ray has intersected the Sphere or not.
TexmapPigment
 
Triangle
Fully describes a Triangle's placement and orientation in a Scene as well as whether a Ray has intersected the Triangle or not.
Vector
